item.title: Benchmark of Ghost Blog Against WordPress
item.description: This week i was trying to be familiar with node and ghost Blog. Launched a blog in my VPS. I will say Over whelming performance. As you can see i have posted how to install it with Apache server. I will now show you some benchmark report by Apache Benchmark tool. Lets see.
